diff_act: 1.adjust the refresh rate via the database

regen.absent_element: adjustable facility map refresh rate implementation
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the facility map refresh rate to be adjusted via the database and update the GUI display accordingly.
The system shall deliver non-critical alarm notifications to the operator's workstation in a timely manner, as defined in the database settings.

regen.absent_element: adjustable facility map refresh rate implementation
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow adjustment of the facility map refresh rate via the database and implement the adjusted rate.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
